case.name: Dizzykaze
case.description: Shimakaze has taken a blow to the head, and will be very dizzy for the round.

case.name: Japanese
case.description: Shimakaze's speech had temporarily reverted to Japanese, and has only just come back.

trigger.state: $%^#(*! -llo? Am I coming through clearly now?
`%{|;<.| -tion systems are back up now, I think.
\{].'_=@* -ower's never been damaged like that before. I'll have to be more careful.

case.name: Rensouhou Returns
case.description: Shimakaze's little robot friend, who disappeared at the start of the game, returns.

case.name: Rensouhou Leaves
case.description: Shimakaze's little robot friend is sent away.

case.name: Shimakaze Stripping
case.description: Shimakaze's gloves burn away instead of being stripped off. The rest of her clothing will disappear in a similar fashion.
